price: دوى ويل: كه لېوه يې را څخه وخوري حال دا چې موږ يوه قوي ډله يو نو بيا خو به موږ خامخا تاوانيان يو.
arabic: قَالُواْ لَئِنۡ أَكَلَهُ ٱلذِّئۡبُ وَنَحۡنُ عُصۡبَةٌ إِنَّآ إِذٗا لَّخَٰسِرُونَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: qālū la-in akalahu al-dhi'bu wanaḥnu ʿuṣ'batun innā idhan lakhāsirūna
